sentences.en: His handwriting, from earliest young manhood, was flowing and graceful.
sentences.cn: 他的字从小就写得流畅优美。

sentences.en: I have to admit that I have bad handwriting.
sentences.cn: 我不得不承认自己的字写得不好看。

sentences.en: I recognised her handwriting on the envelope.
sentences.cn: 我认出了信封上她的笔迹。

sentences.en: I've never come across hieroglyphics like the handwriting of Peter Smallwood.
sentences.cn: 我从未见过像彼得·斯莫尔伍德那么难辨认的笔迹。

sentences.en: It was difficult to make out the manager's handwriting.
My handwriting has never been very neat.
sentences.cn: 我的字从来都写得不够工整。

sentences.en: My handwriting is poorer than hers.
Out of question, it is his handwriting.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问, 这是他的字迹.

sentences.en: She recognized her mother's grace handwriting on the envelope.
sentences.cn: 她认出信封上她母亲那娟秀的笔迹.

sentences.en: The address was in Anna's handwriting.
The boy's handwriting is difficult to read.
The handwriting belongs to a male.
The handwriting expert attested to the genuineness of the signature.
sentences.cn: 笔迹专家作证该签名无讹.

sentences.en: There's been a noticeable improvement in his handwriting.
sentences.cn: 他的书法有了明显的进步.

sentences.en: You can't tell if it's a man or a woman from handwriting.
sentences.cn: 从笔迹上看不出他是男的还是女的.
